name: An animated tribute to the Interactions of Color by Joseph Albers
description:
23-03-19 

Around this period I had discovered and explored the work of Joseph. fascination began.
By looking at his interactions of colors I could always only see it in motion, this is how I see things. I want to share the way I see them with you and how beautiful are the interactions between color. Focusing on color interaction such as we notice it is not always self-evident, with simple geometry, distances, Joseph really found a way to enhance our means to see it, making it easier for us to focus on the core of color perception.

This is why I picked up Trapcode TAO and in an attempt to show you how it is perceived when I look at it. And to celebrate one of the numerous spiritual mentors, from whom the diffused knowledge has impregnated my work. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josef_Albers

01-09-21
minting this : 1080x1080 | 270 frames | 0.04 Seconds per frame
